verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Do you feel the world is broken? We do Do you feel the shadows deepen? We do But do you know that all the dark Won’t stop the light from getting through? We do Do you wish that you could see it all made new? We do{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is all creation groaning? It is Is a new creation coming? It is Is the glory of the Lord To be the light within our midst? It is Is it good that we remind ourselves of this? It is{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is anyone worthy, is anyone whole? Is anyone able to break the seal and open the scroll The Lion of Judah, who conquered the grave He is David’s root and the Lamb, who died to ransom the slave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Does the Father truly love us? He does Does the Spirit move among us ? He does And does Jesus our Messiah hold forever those He loves? He does Does our God intend to dwell again with us? He does{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is anyone worthy, is anyone whole? Is anyone able to break the seal and open the scroll The Lion of Judah, who conquered the grave He is David’s root and the Lamb, who died to ransom the slave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From ev’ry people and tribe, ev’ry nation and tongue He has made us a kingdom and priests to God, to reign with the Son{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is He wor – thy, is He wor – thy Of all blessing and honor and glo – ry? Is He wor – thy, is He wor – thy? Is He wor – thy of this He is{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He is wor – thy, He is wor – thy, He is!{/lang-eng}
